summary: Website project: update visual design with more color and flair reflecting a Black Apostolic & Holiness church vibe while still feeling mixed-denomination.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Subtle ornamental gold divider flourish on transparent background (holiness-divider.dim_1600x200.png)
- Seamless dark textured background (subtle fabric/stone-like) (holiness-texture-tile.dim_1024x1024.png)

## Edit Images
- Warm up and increase contrast/saturation for a more celebratory worship feel (kmi-hero.dim_1920x800.png > kmi-hero-holiness.dim_1920x800.png)

existing_features.title: Update the global design theme to add more color, energy, and “flare” while reflecting a Black Apostolic & Holiness church aesthetic that still feels welcoming to a mixed-denomination audience; apply the theme consistently across all pages (nav, hero, sections, cards, typography, buttons, links, and special blocks).

Revise Tailwind theme tokens and component utility classes in frontend/src/index.css to support the new look (e.g., deeper near-black/nav surfaces, warm gold accents, richer secondary highlights, improved section surface contrast), and ensure accessible contrast for text, links, and buttons.

Restyle the header and footer to match the updated theme: enhance background treatment (e.g., subtle gradient or elevated dark surface), improve active link styling, and add tasteful accents that convey a celebratory church feel while keeping all routes and labels unchanged.
Enhance the Home page hero presentation to align with the new aesthetic (richer overlay, improved contrast, more dramatic/celebratory feel) while keeping existing hero layout and CTAs intact.

Add subtle visual “flair” elements that can be reused across the site (e.g., ornamental dividers, subtle texture overlays, or accent patterns) and apply them sparingly to key areas such as the hero, section headers, and special blocks without cluttering the UI.

new_feature_requests.summary: Revise website visual styling (color, flair, overall look) to reflect a Black Apostolic & Holiness church aesthetic while maintaining mixed-denomination appeal

projectName: Restyle site with vibrant Black Apostolic & Holiness aesthetic (mixed-denomination friendly)
